policies.title: DPCM n.131 del 18 settembre 2020 - Regolamento in materia di perimetro di sicurezza nazionale cibernetica
policies.title_en: Prime Minister's Decree n.131 of September 18, 2020 - Regulation on national cybersecurity perimeter
key_provisions: Defines criteria for identifying critical ICT assets
Sets notification requirements for procurement of ICT goods and services
Mandates security assessments for 5G network components
Creates framework for golden power intervention
policies.enforcement_notes: Mandatory for all entities operating critical infrastructure and 5G networks. Violations subject to administrative sanctions up to â‚¬1.8M

amendments.description: Extended scope to cloud services and data centers

policies.title: Articolo 28 del DL 21 marzo 2022, n. 21 - Poteri speciali in materia di comunicazioni elettroniche a banda larga basate sulla tecnologia 5G
policies.title_en: Article 28 of Law Decree March 21, 2022, n. 21 - Special powers on 5G broadband electronic communications
key_provisions: Extends golden power review to 5G network agreements
Requires notification for contracts with non-EU suppliers
Establishes 30-60 day review periods for 5G procurement
Mandates security testing for high-risk vendors
Allows government veto or conditional approval
policies.enforcement_notes: Immediate application. Non-compliance results in contract nullification and potential criminal sanctions

amendments.description: Extended review timelines for complex cases

vendor_implications.review_timeline: 30 days standard, 60 days for complex cases

policies.title: Decreto-legge 21 settembre 2019, n. 105 - Disposizioni urgenti in materia di perimetro di sicurezza nazionale cibernetica
policies.title_en: Law Decree September 21, 2019, n. 105 - Urgent provisions on national cybersecurity perimeter
key_provisions: Creates notification obligations for critical operators
policies.enforcement_notes: Foundation law for cybersecurity perimeter, implemented through DPCM 131/2020

summary.regulatory_framework: Italy's 5G and cybersecurity perimeter regulations establish comprehensive controls over critical infrastructure procurement, with special focus on 5G networks and non-EU suppliers
summary.recent_updates: Extended to cloud services and data centers (2021), enhanced 5G review powers (2022-2023)
